cab.content: THIS document is the PROPERTY OF HER britannic MAJESTY^ GOVEENMJENTPrinted for the Cabinet. February 1959C. (59) 2210th February, 1959Copy No.58CABINETFARM PRICE REVIEWNote by the Chancellor of the ExchequerEarlier this week I circulated, for background information, the main factsabout the condition of the agricultural industry (C. (59) 20).2. The Ministerial Committee on the Farm Price Review has now discussed further the line to be taken with the National Farmers' Unions at the Review. TheAgricultural Ministers recommend opening discussions with the Unions on thebasis of a net reduction in the total value of the guarantees of about 4^ millions,made up as follows: CommodityWheat ...RyeWoolMilkEggs (Hen)Eggs (Duck)change is. cwt.lid. cwt.2i-d. lb.id. gallonl d. doz.Id. doz.Value Millions-2i-3iLess: Credit for Small Farmer Schemes ...Net reduction6i4*D. H. A.Treasury Chambers, S.W. 1,10th February, 1959.54727
